description:
Used in a cfform tag, cfapplet lets you reference custom Java applets that you have registered
			using the Railo Administrator.
name: applet

height.description: The height of the applet, in pixels.

hspace.description: Space on each side of the applet, in pixels.

appletsource.description: The name of the registered applet.

width.description: The width of the applet, in pixels.

name.description: The form variable name for the applet.

paramn.description: The name of a registered parameter for the applet.

notsupported.description: The text to display if a page containing a Java applet-based cfform control is opened by a browser that does not support Java or has Java support disabled.

vspace.description: Space above and below applet, in pixels.
